name: Lone Star (Storm121220)
description:
Lone Star is an arena FPS, similar to the game Devil Daggers, where you try to survive as long as you can while waves of increasingly difficult enemies attack you. The goal is to shoot the spawned enemies, to thin out the horde, and upgrade your weapon to handle the enemies that just don't seem to ever quit coming.

This game was made as a final project for the Game Technology course at the University of Texas at Austin.

Gameplay: https://youtu.be/AW_vqPvs5Jg
